meanings.definition: A thin, crisp Indian bread made from lentil flour.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served delicious poppadums with our meal.
meanings.sent2: I love the crunch of poppadums with my curry.
meanings.sent3: When the poppadums started dancing, everyone at the table laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and crispy as a poppadum.
meanings.sent5: The poppadums crackled like autumn leaves underfoot.

meanings.definition: A popular Indian snack typically served with chutney or pickles.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed a variety of poppadums at the party.
meanings.sent2: The poppadums disappeared quickly at the buffet.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a poppadum and ran up the tree.

meanings.sent5: The aroma of the spicy poppadums filled the room.
